page.title: 17LEISURE IN REETH1
page.content: {ADULTS:-}In Reeth there are number of evening and afternoon groups and clubs meeting together.There is lace making,American rug hooking,patchwork,for the ladies,as well as a Wives Club and Women's Institute.There is a Badminton club and an Athletic Club;they all compete with local clubs.There is also a local Darts Club. {Children and Teenagers:-}There are a number of organisations and activies. Brownies,and Cubs for the younger ones.Scouts, Girls Club, Youth Club and a Junior Football Team for the older children. The children enjoy cycling, roller skating,pool,computer games and watching television.
